Abductor pollicis longus Dorsal Radius
Dorsal Ulna

``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Proximal Dorsal Radius @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Proximal dorsal Ulna @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - IO Membrane @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Base of 1st metacarpal @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Posterior Interosseous N.]({{< var ref-posterior-interosseous-nerve.path >}}) ([C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}}), [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **RC**: Radial deviation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **1st CMC**: Abduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
